name: A Kayak For Kyle
description:
Description
On the last stop of Christmas, Santa's reindeer are too tired to go on. Kyle is the last one on the list and Santa goes solo to deliver Kyle's kayak. Sled down the mountain before Christmas is over, or else try again next year.

Controls
Paddle forward - Hold and release between K and A
Turn right - Hold down K
Turn left - Hold down A
Reset boat rotation - Y
Reset level - R

Credits
Game designed by - Joey, Evie, Zach, Hao, Phil

Media credits
Cutscene music - "Christmas Into" -  DDmyzik
Additional models - TinkerCad
